Package stateMachine

Class StateMachine<W extends Iterable<S>,S>

java.lang.Object
stateMachine.StateMachine<W,S>
Type Parameters:
W - the Iterable word that will be analyzed
S - the symbols inside the word
public class StateMachine<W extends Iterable<S>,S> extends Object
A StateMachine that will read through a sequence of State through its Transition
Author:
nickyecen
